main event: A ground-visual observation of a moving and flickering lighted object occurred near Springfield, Pennsylvania, on May 6, 1957.
interesting points: The object was reported to be moving erratically., The report was part of the Project Blue Book investigation into UFO sightings., The observer's description was noted as a significant comet., The sighting indicated varying courses of the object., Information was communicated between several US Air Force bases regarding this observation.
witness description: Mr. Otto, a civilian observer, reported the sighting.
